title: Ok, so this blue essence/IP non--sense, IDC I just want Urfwick.

embed.description: League of Legends (LoL) Summoner data for Teraxe in North America. Contains statistics, match data and more to help players analyze and improve performance.

body:
I have almost every champ in the game and virtually every rune in the game, and 20 rune pages, and I am sitting on about 20k IP. By my count I will have about 90k BE after refunds.

There is one champ that has always been my favorite, I have played over 2000 ranked games with him, 2026 to be exact, and countless unranked, thousands I am sure. That champ is Warwick.

There is only one thing I have ever wanted in this game and that is the urfwick skin. I don't know if it is possible for me to get 60k BE before the sale ends, I would gladly trade 100 or even 125 champs for urfwick. 

This just sucks, that I will finally have the chance to get the one thing in the game I have always wanted, and I am going to fall short.

Here are my stats going back to Season 1 for people that want to check.

http://www.lolking.net/summoner/na/19576570/Teraxe#/ranked-stats
